review:
Dr. Ajay Kumar is very nice and friendly.   

Quietly observed our problem in our language in Tamil and suggest for physiotherapy.  

We satisfied the physio treatment given by Sidharth Hospital physiotherapist Ms. Pyusha.

We are happy and recomend Dr. Ajay Kumar to prescribe the minimum requirement of medicines.

DR.AJAY KUMAR despite his busy schedule was always available for us for any emergency consultations or suggestions. Words can tell only a bit about his generous contribution and time he spends towards the well being of his patients. Strongly recommend him for any ORTHOPEDIC related consultations or treatments. Once again, we are greatly thankful to him as a family. God bless and may he reach greater heights and may he succeed in his career which we strongly believe is driven with immense passion and knowledge.. Thank you AJAY KUMAR gaaru ğŸ™ğŸ™ğŸ™ğŸ™ .
